3 namespace Ubiquity\db\export;

5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
7 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\ManyToManyParser;
8 use Ubiquity\db\SqlUtils;
9 
19 class DbExport {
20  protected $manyToManys = [ ];
21 
22  public function __construct() {
23  }
24 
25  public function exports() {
26  $result = [ ];
27  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
28  $models = CacheManager::getModels ( $config, true );
29  foreach ( $models as $model ) {
30  $tableExport = new TableExport ( $model );
31  $result [] = $tableExport->exports ( $this );
32  }
33  foreach ( $this->manyToManys as $target => $ManyToManyParser ) {
34  $ManyToManyParser->init ();
35  $sqlExport = new SqlExport ();
36  $members = [ $ManyToManyParser->getFkField (),$ManyToManyParser->getMyFkField () ];
37  $fields = SqlUtils::getFieldList ( $members, $target );
38  $result [] = $sqlExport->exports ( $target, $fields );
39  }
40  return \implode ( "\n", $result );
41  }
42 
43  public function addManyToMany($jointable, $memberTargetEntity) {
44  if (! isset ( $this->manyToManys [$jointable] )) {
45  $this->manyToManys [$jointable] = new ManyToManyParser ( $memberTargetEntity ["class"], $memberTargetEntity ["member"] );
46  }
47  }
48 }
